content: Many great deals, but 3 of 5 for one glaring flaw that needs to be addressed. The UI is mostly decent, as long as you are purchasing. The process to return damaged or missing items is very difficult. When I attempt to get the return barcode, it never sends an email for the barcode for the package to my email (yes I checked spam, ads, and every other box). Trying to download the file directly to my phone, resulted in a broken link with a picture of a dog. I literally had to screen shot the codes.

I find the app to be satisfactory overall, but there are a couple of issues worth mentioning. Firstly, shipping costs are not always transparent and can catch you off guard at checkout, which often gets annoying. Secondly, there's an inconsistency with doorbell ringing upon delivery. Therefore it would be beneficial to display shipping fees upfront in the cart for clarity.

The app, in my opinion, has declined in the area of overall usability recently. There is the obvious crashing and freezing while scrolling issues, but more so, it feels more clunky. Amazon had a good thing going for years with their app, but somewhere along the way they overcomplicated it. Also, the inspire icon is a total waste of space and the weird green instead of the light blue coloring that we all enjoyed is unsettling. They've got some work to do. UPDATE Their shipping is trash.

Was working fine earlier today but now I can't even open it....frequent crashes Update on 4/29/2024: I was in the middle of adding things to my cart and searching for things, when my screen freezes while trying to select a product to look at. I was able to use the search bar and scroll down and such,however when I try to click on a product to look at, it freezes. I've tried clearing my apps, restarting my phone, etc. No luck. It keeps happening. Please fix!

Aside from crashing and being unable to load recent orders and lists, the latest update removed the ability to screenshot. I noticed when trying to save a seller's return policy, which makes it feel like they are trying to avoid having proof of policies, prices, product images, etc. to make disputes and returns more difficult for the customer. Uninstalling the app until this is fixed and using the browser next time i need to use Amazon, if i ever get this bad taste for it out of my mouth again.

Now more painfully slow, bloated & lagging, making this a very difficult app to use, although of course, still allows adding to cart & make purchases. Amazon's search tool is NOT made primarily to help find exactly what I'm looking for, but instead pushes too many IRRELEVANT items, whether sponsored or popular. Also, sorting by department doesn't always work as needed. Extremely difficult to adjust search settings to get proper results - very frustrating and exceedingly time consuming.

Just recently the app is really starting to misbehave to the point I have to force stop and clear cache. I get stuck with searches, stuck with things in my basket I can't delete or save for later. It's nearly unusable. Now as for prime. What a way to degrade what was a great value proposition. Free next day delivery now has Co editions attached, music is like Spotify basic not playing what I want when I want, ads appearing on the amazon video and degraded quality. And they out the price UP!!??

Pop-up window that pops up when you ad an item to the cart is extremely annoying and distracting! Please remove. I want to shop and enjoy it without being hassled to add previously purchased items to cart every time I hit 'Add to Cart'. Very annoying feature. The worked great the way it was. Also, lists can be more simply accessible. Just show my my lists, there are e categories in Lists...unnecessary.

This app came pre-installed on my phone. I use occasionally, but I can easily do without it. It just updated on my phone despite my having all the settings allowing auto-updates turned off. And yes, I do kn√≤w there‚Äôs more than one and where they are. If I had wanted the app updated, I would have done it myself. I don‚Äôt care if this activity is controlled by Amazon or Google‚Äôs overbearing, bloated sense of entitlement‚ÄîKNOCK IT OFF.

The app automatically adapts to my phone's dark mode settings. Cool, except that the font in the search bar is white, as is the search bar, and the icons at the bottom (home, account, explore, etc) are black ... Just like their background. I.e., nothing is visible. So now use of the app is difficult, and I'm not going to change my phone's settings every time just to use the app. Oh well, I'm sure Jeff doesn't need my money anyway.

Latest update: The new "Rufus" content completely bogs down an item page. It becomes so bad I have to conpletely stop the app and reload. Older updates: Extremely slow to load content (and getting worse with each update) unless you're on wifi. The latest UI updates are just awful. The change to the lists (and lists of lists, to boot) is horrible. Interface gets worse and worse.

I pay for two day shipping and thats no longer reliable. I may just drop the whole membership since Im not needing any of the other perks (movies/shows, music etc.). They dont allow PayPal. The quality of sellers has gone WAY down. Lots of scammers selling junk that isn't as advertised. I don't care how easy returns are if I return MOST of what I buy just to end up buying somewhere else! Last year was the first in many I DIDNT buy ALL of x-mas from Amazon. Amazon is really going in the trash.

great and easy to use app. Haven't had any issues with it since installing the app 4 years ago. Prices however, are not always the lowest on Amazon as they used to be a couple of years ago. I would guess ot is due to having more individual sellers as well as companies .... regardless, comparing prices from over companies might save you a bit, while other times Amazon comparatively does have the best price. It had become our go to "store" majority of the time.

It's always been a terrible app, and like everything Amazon it's only gotten worse as they've made searching less effective, and favored promoted items that don't match your filters. But what finally got me to write this review is the fact that they are now sending notifications that are "suggesting" products. So if I want shipping and delivery alerts, I have to also get pinged with ads. I'm glad they are being sued by the FTC, and I hope they get broken into pieces and fade into irrelevance.

Latest update has made this unusable because scrolling a product page locks up the app. The AI on product pages is also extremely useless and an annoying waste of resources and screen space, as well as making it more of a hassle to check reviews and questions/answers. It needs to be optional with a choice to disable it completely. Who needs some irrelevant AI 1st grade book report style explanation of what some basic concept is, just because that word was included in search terms???

For the past year I've been fighting to cancel the prime membership. The process to cancel is like a endless maze. When I finally got to cancel it, I find out that Amazon Prime Membership has charged my bank without my permission. This keeps happening so I had no choice but to delete the account completely. Prime isn't as convenient as it used to be and honestly it's better to just wait until you got $25 worth of stuff in the cart to get free shipping. There's no way to actually contact Amazon.

The app keeps closing every time my screen goes dark. I'll be scrolling on page 4 or something and go to do something really quick. When I come back the app is closed. When I open it I have to start my search all over again. I've tried everything from redownloading the app to restarting my phone. I looked for updates and that's not the problem either. Please fix this problem.

Years ago, w/o any warning, they disabled my ability to leave product feedback, maybe b/c I posted price comparisons for several products in a review, tho I've seen others do the same. They never actually told me why and haven't responded to my inquiries, so I'm left w/o being able to leave feedback, which also keeps me from being able to ask product questions. As for the app, the new AI slide-up panel at the bottom gets in the way of some buttons, like to cancel a subscription.

It keeps glitching. The app is just one of the many and the least problem with Amazon. I have come to hate this company. I really do not shop here like I used to. One reason is the app itself. I have to open and close it all the time to get it to work, tells you it can not add an item, but you have to check before you buy because the item was added multiple times. Trying to delete items from the cart hardly works without closing and reopening or waiting until the next day.

App is currently useless. Latest update in March 2024 causes it to freeze. I haven't been able to use it at all. You can't click on an item. It acts as if you're trying to click on a frozen screenshot. No response at all. Sometimes you can't even scroll. Such a shame for an app that used to be very slick. Will uninstall it and wait for the developers to fix.

No longer let's you take screenshots, for example I want to take a screenshot of a purchase before I make it so I can have proof of the total, my company compensates me for items needed for my job, and it no longer allows that. There's no reason to not let us take pictures of our own purchases in our own accounts. Every day Amazon takes more away while continuing to charge almost more than any other service.

Worthless...I enrolled in Amazon Prime for faster shipping. The first time I used it, I got a notice package in my town, I'm thinking cool. But no, I get a second notice 12 hours later that it won't be delivered for two more days. What a messed up way to business. You took my money for enrollment pretty damn quick, but when it comes to doing your part, you lack in so many ways. I will never use Amazon again to buy anything. You just lost a good loyal customer. ZERO STARS ZERO STARS

I've been using this app for years, paying prime for years, I'm already tired of orders always arriving late, very late, I even know people who don't pay prime and it arrives quickly. And they rarely arrive to me on time, even carefully checking that they are prime products and they don't work for me. It's not once or twice, it's many times. I don't pay prime anymore!

App is a complete mess. It's so cluttered and full of random categories/sections that nobody would ever use and giant panels that take up the entire screen with just one product. Why do I need to scroll through 20 varieties of recommendation lists just to get to the reviews? It's the only app I've used in almost a decade that consistently lags because of all the useless junk it has to load in. I was looking for something and just stopped and went elsewhere because the experience is so bad

The app browsing experience itself is pretty good, but throwing "Buy prime now" in my face upon opening - as per traditional predatory Amazon marketing methods - was a sure way to make me remove it. If they actually started to not pester and trick (free Prime, absolutely free, not really, are you sure you want to lose your benefits, are you absolutely sure?) people into subscribing, I might actually rate it higher. Edit: basket functionality, broken worse than website experience

Edit 4/6/24: they moved the bar back to the top. Thanks for listening, Amazon! Original review: was great until they moved the search bar to the bottom. It's not easy to use. It's not user-friendly and it's not intuitive at all. It also doesn't load the whole page anymore (reviews don't always show up).

I have been using this for a long time. Every time there is an update, the app gets laggy or does a force stop, and the app closes on its own. This isn't a new app, and it shouldn't be having these types of issues. I cannot check my previous orders or even look up items to purchase now because it's so laggy and freezing. Do better!!

Some prices are steep, others are better than in stores. The only thing I'll no longer purchase is Jewelry. Too much coming in from China; silver plated copper sold as .925 Sterling. Unfortunately it takes a few months of wearing the item before the silver plate wears off. Deliveries are great, most times exactly as estimated. The app is very easy to navigate.

I have had no bad experience with Amazon, not only from shopping and shipping, but also being a prime member for several years now. Sure there are other online stores who sell items cheaper but it shows not only in the quality of merchandise but all the way to the packaging. Amazon is clearly the best choice all around. Thanks Amazon!!

Last few days app CONSTANTLY FREEZES AD NAUSEUM! Have cleared cache, force stopped, etc., uninstalled/reinstalled app-nada! Even accepted all permissions. Freezing also affecting my phone which I've restarted several times. After freeze, phone hiccups, screen goes black. Exact same thing happens on another phone! Absolutely no problem w/any other app. Found if I force stop app 3-4 times in a row it sometimes works fine but only for a few minutes. Can't find any solution on web. Losing hope...

It's been around a month I can't view an item. The app crashed while scrolling down to look at the info, it crashes when I want to look at the images. Right now, I've been struggling for about an hour to view 3 items. I have to constantly close the app, because my phone asks me to do so because the app is not responding. In the last 15 minutes, I had to close the app at least 10 times. It's impossible to view an item.

I would give 4 Stars but I hate when I place an order of multiple items, get a total and then you split it up into say 5 or 6 separate charges! If I overdraft, I get charged a fee for each charge instead of one! Also, If my original choice a payment declines what gives you the right to try a different card in my wallet?????? I never authorized that. ALSO AM TIRED OF GETTING CRUSHED ITEMS THAT ARE EITHER PACKED WITH VERY HEAVY ITEMS, OR PUT IN A CHEAP ENVELOPE WITH NO PROTECTION.

App has become unusable. View In Your Room and 3D View in every item listing (which is not allowed to be disabled even with permission settings in app settings), along with advertisements placed in search results listings have made the app incredibly slow (30+ sec loading time any time you scroll through item images or change item options. Freezes now while scrolling through search results.) to the point it is unusable. I'll be shopping eBay and Walmart from here on out until these critical flaw

Amazon is nothing but a bunch of complete rip off artists. I cancel an order and 30 seconds later they charged my account and then conveniently tell me I have to wait 7 to 10 days to get my money back. There aren't too many companies that I know that can get away with accepting cancellations and then charging you 30 seconds later. what they need my money that bad to collect interest on for the next 7 to 10 days they can't give it back right away? Their customer service sucks!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I had a problem with a seller where I bought 3 packs of 2 of an item and one of the packs had an empty subpackage. I put this review on the sellers product and they rejected it due to using the word package. Seems like part of the problem with the new AI programs used but if you aren't going to at least pass it to humans to review you're doing it wrong. At worst they are keeping negative reviews off to help sales.

Resource hog, ever since a few weeks ago or so, some kind of update causes it to be extra heavy on mobile system resources, causing slow performance and sometimes just refusing to load anything. Considering that I'm running this on almost bone stock Android with top tier hardware, I can only imagine how terrible it is for people with budget phones.

App keeps refreshing back to the home page if I take too long to click on something or even if I leave it open while I check an address for shipping. I've cleared the cache and updated the app. I don't know why the app can't stay on the page I was on for 10 seconds while I read information about the seller or check measurements. I'm ready to go back to using the browser, except the browser page will probably refresh too.

Amazon is probably the most well managed corporation in America!!! In my opinion! The other big box store just can't compete for my preferences. The app is great as well! I look to see what their biggest seller is in a category. As they show them w header! And they explicitly let you know how many items are left in stock! So you do not get emails saying they're out of them! The whole app is streamlined for fast purchases! You either make a large order or a one item order! Bravo!!! Well done!!

Orders list used to be split up, so that things to be delivered were separate from things that have been delivered. why did they change this? it's so much less user friendly now; much harder to read and know what I'm still waiting for. Don't like the 'targeted' ads over notification (how gross and rarely things I'd actually like), or how few non-robots there are to communicate with.

Generally the Amazon experience is good, but the app has begun inserting adds into my purchase history, this is annoying and there is no signposting as to how to stop it. There is also seemingly no method of leaving feedback or asking questions about app functionality in the app. If I'm wrong or simply missing the option I would appreciate feedback.

overall all the app is useful but extremely inefficient. I like the buy now and lists feature but... Organization is about as good as teenager's cluttered room. The entire interface is all over the place with no sound logic to it and lacks standardization. The absolute worst is canceling a subscription - recently my kids ordered a subscription and of course you can't cancel it though the app, you have to go to the desktop to manage your subscriptions - talk about terrible customer service

As an Android user, My notifications are always silent with this app. I had to go into notification history and long press to get to the area where I could customize sounds and notifications. I don't know why this option isn't in the app. Now I have a nice doorbell and car horn sound. üëç Minus three stars for making me do it manually.

Had to stop using. Amazon drivers seem to not be able to find my address and delivers to my neighbor who keeps my package. So frustrating. USPS, FedEx, UPS, Walmart+.... All find my address just fine.... But Amazon..... Nope! In fairness...the app is great...prices are great...been using for years.... But Amazon Drivers ruin the experience. So sad. I have spent $1,000s with them.

Unable to request refund on product that has not arrived though the app says I am able. After hitting contact seller and going through the prompts, the app tells you Amazon is handling customer service. Go through the prompts again and it says you have to contact the seller. You hit that button just to start over and around and around you go. Essentially, there is no customer service. Frankly, Amazon isn't the place to buy anything anymore anyway. Better off going back to brick and mortar again.

I give Amazon a 3-star rating because of the ease of returns and customer service is exceptional. I would give it a 5-star rating, if not for the fact that I continuously have to return items. It seems that many of the items sold through Amazon are possibly items companies have not passed their quality control and were rejected with one or more obvious design flaws. Oh well, as long as I can return the flawed items there is hope of finding quality items eventually. I buy from a prime account.

Mobile Application worked fine for years, now it crashes constantly or I have to wait over 5 seconds before each action to do anything. Thankfully I can shop on my full size computer in my office as this application is completely unstable and useless. Not sure what the engineers have done and it's clear from recent reviews that's it's not only myself with this issue BTW everything else on my mobile device works perfectly fine including making this review ;-).

Amazon Prime= we will charge both the seller and you extra money and claim that you're getting a great deal! Check out process is terrible. When I go to check out, on the same device, with the same cards that I use all the time it keeps asking me to re-verify the card. I don't carry all these things around with me. That's why they're saved in the app. And customer service is a joke.

I've waited until I had a decent amount of orders before making a review. My experience is 50/50. Some orders were filled with items of the wrong color or patterns ( phone case and a tool bag.) a pair of shoes I ordered were missing the insoles. The last 2 items I ordered were late. Amazon did a decent job handling the refunds. I will continue to use this app. And hope in the future that the items I order will be correct and on time, but if they aren't I know Amazon will make it right.

Suggested improvements: 1) an alert from the app letting the buyer know that their package is +/- 5 to 10 stops away. It alleviate having to check the app directly over & over. You already have the ability to do this so why not implement it? 2) Country of origin is not always the same as shipping origin. Typically, Chinese shipments are sat on for 5 days before movement, adding more time shipping to final destination. Perhaps we don't want to wait & want another product option with less time.

They constantly force me to reenter my very long password even though I already signed in. VERY ANNOYING. You have made this app completely useless. I don't need or want to jump through these pointless hoops that do NOT increase security in any way. If anything, you are incentivizing people to use less secure passwords due to being unnecessarily forced to enter it over and over and over on my own phone. Get it together, Amazon. Not a good look to make it harder to spend money.

Have to wait 15 to 20 seconds to view images with VIEW IN YOUR ROOM designation, which would not be a major problem except the product is not something I need to see in my room. A plastic sandwich container? Really? I need to see this in my room? So many products that should not have this functionality that so not need it. Those without the VIEW IN YOUR ROOM display instantly. This is only 1 of many issues I have with thus app. The UI is setup to sell more, but in doing so drives me away.

I have been an Amazon Prime member, shopping through Amazon, for several years. In recent years I began using their subscribe and save option for items I need on a regular basis. I was tired of going to a bunch of different stores, hoping to find my items in stock. I have received most of my deliveries on time, and well handled. Amazon customer service has always responded in a prompt and professional manner to any issues I've had.

I've never had such an issue til recently. I ordered an item and paid for one day delivery. The day my package was to be delivered, I saw the Amazon truck drive away from my house, believing that they dropped off my package only to not find it anywhere and then get notified that there was a problem with delivery. I SAW THE TRUCK AT MY HOUSE, and they said they'll try again the next day. The app works well, but they have a problem with delivery, which I've never had such a problem before

It's OK, but there is no way to get to the invoice view in the app. Also it doesn't fit the screen properly to even view orders. Lately the tracking hasn't been working either. I like the tracking to help me know when they are steps away to make sure the dogs are in the kennel or in the house. I don't Carry my device around outside unless this is working. It would be nice if my hubby and I both got notices in case we forget to tell each other we have deliveries coming. We choose delivery share

Prices Change Too Much. I know it's business, but that's a widely used excuse to act dishonorably. I will see a price and then less than an hour or 2 will go by and the price will change. I've tried to buy things and it seems that I was unable to make the purchase because they really wanted to charge more. It seems it was advertised at one price to draw me, and then changed at checkout to take advantage. ü§î

First when I got my slime from Amazon, it sucked because of how messy it was. Then I got a Christmas hat that lights up but then my battery had to be fixed because I almost lost the battery inside my hat (my hat today still works) but sometimes when my family buys stuff on Amazon, it turns out bad. If Amazon would stop making everything expensive, it would be a better app (although some stuff on Amazon is cheap üòâ) and Amazon is very good at delivering people's stuff. So three stars :)

It's ridiculous that you search something and it'll have the name in the search box but when you actually click on it Amazon doesn't even have the product in question but you don't know this so have to still sift through the junk items they're showing. A few word spring's to mind. CON and AMAZON ARE TIME WASTERS. Also the choice you get on UK Amazon is absolutely terrible compared to US Amazon.

The app shows the same items over and over. And usually it's the low quality items. Even when people complain about the quality the item still ends up with a high rating. So adding the 5 star filter is rendered useless. They have pretty good customer service outside of allowing sellers try to trick their customers into accepting payment for a review. I turned down the payment and they still got away with reporting me for accepting payments. Now I can't leave reviews anymore.

Half of the orders made with 2 days shipping turn into at least 5 days, clearly fake reviews on products, prices are more expensive than at a store, and increasing amount of times that I receive a "order has been dropped off in mailbox" (I don't have a mailbox or am I part of a complex that could have a drop off place) only to randomly show up a few days later. I rarely use Amazon these days but it's also no longer convenient when you're in a pinch like a few years or even months ago.

Do not buy from sellers in china. So fed up with sellers from china. It says stock is in the uk, and they are clearly lying. They then give you a refund without asking, so you can't report the poor service. Do not buy from sellers in china! Apps broken again. Unable to delete any items from the shopping cart! The red delete slider appears, but you can't do anything with it !! Oh and Amazon need to stop chinese sellers making out items are in uk and when faulty charge 80% restocking fee

For the past 3 months or so, the app gets stuck in a loading state very, very often on my android (Pixel 8). Videos don't load, and neither does clicking buy now; it loads indefinitely. Sometimes order history doesn't load either. It's just degraded a TON this whole year as far as loading speed.

The search features more and more favoring pay to play operators rather than the item you're actually looking for. I feel the quality of the app has been going downhill lately. I wouldn't have posted this but they asked what I was thinking so here's my honest review. I have a photo of it offering me a three pedal setup for a manual transmission car directly under certifying that these parts fit your Harley-Davidson ü§£.

I do prefer the app but lately, the errors are way too many. Open the app = error Open sponsored shop link = error Open sponsored item link = error Open the suggested item link in the row below the item you're looking at it's a roulette game of error or no error. Trying again will help with the suggested row of items. But sponsored shops, items, and suggested shops. Don't bother. It doesn't matter if I'm on wifi, 5G, or 4G. Please fix this bug.

Has the app EVER worked properly? Loads poorly, can't set price outside of the set ranges provided, and switching from Relevant to Low to High drops product options by THOUSANDS. How does the inventory go from 2,000 products when sorted by default and then 132 when sorted by Low to High? Amazon is obviously a problem on its own, but the app is just pathetic for how big the corporation is. I've seen small clothing companies with better websites.

Sick of the constant glitches this app has. It doesnt show show correct product information or when it does it doesnt add correct size or selection to cart. Im having to constantly get Amazon to pickup their incorrect items for return & then lose interest in buying correct item again due to hassle & wait on refunds! When I try the same products on web browser the correct items/sizes/selections add to cart. The app is only useful for quickly browsing items or checking on order status.

Stop moving functions around! I don't want to waste 15 minutes trying to guess where in the menu tree you've stashed a function that I used a week ago (Switch Accounts, Subscribe and Save, etc.). And orders need to be archivable so you can find things that you ordered more than 6 months ago.

First time ordering on Amazon had to return 4 items. Came in fine and shipped them back in the same box. 3 items say return completed and the 4th I'm being charged as if I didn't include it in the box. No way to appeal this even though I know they have cameras all over their facilities. Ridiculous, never using Amazon again. Ebay is better for returns

Amazon has this problem where they take the money for an order and when it's tike to receive your order magically the order needs to be revised and I have to pay all over again cuz they never even took the money. I hate placing an order, and it looks like I'm going to receive it only for that day to come, and I get a "payment revision needed" message. I just end up canceling the order instead.

Amazon has gone WAY downhill. I just sat on hold for almost an hour before being hung up on. The rep never came back on the line. I only called because the chat wasn't working. I'm gonna switch to a different delivery app. There's no point in trying to use Amazon anymore. Subpar products, subpar customer service. No longer worth the price.

Generally I like this app but there are some things you cannot do like click one link to get help instead of going around in circles. Browsing History used to be cookie based so remove the cookie and it resets your choice to save history Some marketing items sometimes turn themselves on and could be months before you notice it.

Can no longer collect items from pick up locker since app udate as app does not realise location settings are turned ON. Gets stuck at "Please turn location settings on" screen and will not go further, imprisoning my items in an unattainable location as customer service cannot open remotely either. Will no longer shop with Amazon as the convenience for someone who cannot accept doorstep deliveries (flat) is no longer available.

2 of my last 4 deliveries have been delayed, as Prime member for years I feel Amazon's app is designed to completely ignore this. The app works well otherwise, but the "Contact us " section sucks unless you have time for a phone call because you won't chat with a person. Not that it matters, they don't give you anything for the delay anyways which makes buying things based on when you'll get it kind of worthless

Mad! Taking 3 wks for refunds. Shipping and charging my bank acct, for affirm loan purchases. I even had a large order last yr never got refunded when it was affirm loan purchases. Affirm said take up with Amazon, Amazon said take up with affirm. After 30 days I was told they couldn't find it.. so lost that large amount $. They charge my credit card through them for issue they have w/ supposedly my bank acct. An can't use their app 1/2 time. what happens to paying 4 a yr of prime at discount.

Well the day I decided to cancel my prime subscription- I get charge for it....not even on the day of the monthly renewal. Filed an unauthorized claim cause it is illegal to charge on a different day then the monthly payment AND to charge after the subscription was canceled. I should just subscribe with Amazon and not with a third party like Google where it is impossible to get customer support! Very disappointed.

Stopped shopping with amazon for a while now, the app is useless and just stops loading after using it for a minute or two. The website compatibility is horrendous when using it on a mobile phone. Just given up now and might aswell cancel my Prime subscription too if I'm not shopping via these lot anymore. Can't even renew my membership after accidently cancelling it because the website and app are so useless on a mobile phone. It's your guys loss now.

there is this mythical invoice button in the order area, but it has yet to display itself for me. I am an android app user and this button has never displayed, actually there 100% no reference to an invoice anywhere in my app. I realize this shows up for most, but even after removing the app and then reinstalling, it doesn't show up. otherwise, like the app.

The application does not contain many of the website functions, such as the ability to attach images via messaging. Additionally, it is lacking/missing many more website functions, such as the ability to subscribe to prime. Overall, the application requires a much-needed update to resolve these issues and to add all the missing features/functions.

Their order feature works. Other than that, it's menus hidden behind menus in the most haphazard way possible so they can put more junk ads upfront. Bad app. I'd say use the website so you can at least see all the options instead of scrolling and missing the fourth drop down of a drop down.

The whole appeal of Amazon was fast shipping now it's AI customer service and they can't keep commitments to deliver on time. Plus the raising Prime prices all the time, adding commercials and limiting the scrolling ability of the apps pruducts and the pages are filled with a bunch of ads an incorrect information about the product you're trying to purchase.

The basket is not fully functional. Save for later, delete and quantity adjustment are not triggering the expected result. If you've added something you no longer want to purchase or want to decrease the quantity, there's no way to do that via the app right now. You'll have to log through a browser to amend your basket contents and complete the order. Not user friendly at all especially given this is one of the core features of the app.

This you should be cautious about this app as I had someone trying to scam me out of nearly $1000 and reported it and got nothing done about it. I haven't ever had such a terrible experience with any other businesses before. I ordered only two items which one was delivered within a few days without any issues.
